oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alberta land cover change 2000-2012, township level For more information, please read the paper: Ruan, X., F. Qiu and M. Dyck. 2016. “The Effects of Environmental and Socio-Economic Factors on Land-Use Changes.” Environmental Monitoring and Assessment 188(8): 1-31
